actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
description: Taking its name from its crimson feathers and aggressive nature, the **blood hawk** fearlessly attacks almost any animal, stabbing it with its dagger like beak. Blood hawks flock together in large numbers, attacking as a pack to take down prey.
name: Blood Hawk
traits: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
